Underweight 
 - milk, rice , red meat, nuts, whole grain breads, salmon, avocado, dark chocolate, eggs. 

 Normal Weight 
 - whole grains, vegetables, whole fruits, fish and poultry, calcium rich foods, meats. 

 Overweight 
 - beans, soup, dark chocolate, pureed vegetables, yogurt with berries, apples, nuts, grape fruit. 

 Obese 
 - salad, cabbage, beetroot, dinner recipes, mushroom, chicken, eggs, vegetables.
